snippet.title: Backbeat Gameplay Trailer #1
snippet.description:
Backbeat is the second game from award-winning studio Ichigoichie. This time-based puzzle strategy combines elements of tactical strategy and puzzle games, together with a 1990s funk aesthetic.  Unique to this game are a multilinear time-based environment puzzle with resource management rules, and music which is produced by player movement choices. 

In this gameplay video we show gameplay footage illustrating core mechanics from the game.

Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1585730/Backbeat/
Retro-themed product website: http://backbeatgame.com/
